markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 6" pfs="Standard">[Flaming Fusillade](/Spells.aspx?ID=753)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 232 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Flames](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon an endless barrage of flames, producing miniature fireballs in your hands to hurl at foes. You cast [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) as part of casting _flaming fusillade_. For the duration of _flaming fusillade_, _produce flame's_ casting time is reduced from 2 actions to 1.

---
**Heightened (9th)** For the duration, you also gain a status bonus to the damage dealt by _produce flame_ equal to _flaming fusillade's_ spell level.
name: Flaming Fusillade

summary_markdown: You call upon an endless barrage of flames, producing miniature fireballs in your hands to hurl at foes.
text: Flaming Fusillade Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 232 2.0 Mystery Flames Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- You call upon an endless barrage of flames, producing miniature fireballs in your hands to hurl at foes. You cast produce flame as part of casting flaming fusillade . For the duration of flaming fusillade , produce flame's casting time is reduced from 2 actions to 1. --- Heightened (9th) For the duration, you also gain a status bonus to the damage dealt by produce flame equal to flaming fusillade's spell level.
